alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geauga, Lake and northwestern Ashtabula Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Willoughby to near Chardon to near West Farmington. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Middlefield, Perry, Burton, Timberlake, Lakeline and Chesterland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
